name: Cogip Frontend
short_description: The Cogip Project is the work and collaboration of backend and frontend developpers who worked together to create a web application which offers companies and their invoices management features.

name: Cogip API
short_description: The Cogip Project is the work and collaboration of backend and frontend developpers who worked together to create a web application which offers companies and their invoices management features.

name: Weather App
short_description: Simple web application that allows users to check the current weather conditions of any location worldwide. Users can enter the name of a city or town, and the app will display the current temperature, weather conditions (e.g., sunny, rainy, cloudy), and other relevant information.

name: Pokedex
short_description: web application that displays a list of Pokémon, details of the selected Pokémon, and includes an authentication system.

name: Project Manager
short_description: Web application designed to help users manage their projects efficiently. It provides a user-friendly interface for organizing tasks and tracking project progress.

name: Random Quote Generator
short_description: Simple web application who displays a random quote each time the user interacts with the application, providing an engaging way to learn web development fundamentals.

name: The Collection
short_description: This project involves creating a website featuring a collection of around ten cards on a chosen theme, such as favorite music, films, recipes, etc. This particular project presents 10 books that the author has read and enjoyed.

name: AZ-store
short_description: Online shoe store with product display, shopping cart, payment form and contact page.

name: To-do list
short_description: Simple web application that allows users to manage tasks through a clean and responsive interface.
